name: Dancing Blade Katteni Momotenshi II: Tears of Eden
name_original: Dancing Blade Katteni Momotenshi II: Tears of Eden
description: Dancing Blade Katte ni Momotenshi II: Tears of Eden (Dancing Blade かってに桃天使 II -Tears of Eden-, lit. "Dancing Blade: Capricious Momotenshi II - Tears of Eden") is a visual novel was Developed and Published by Konami. It was released for the PlayStation and Sega Dreamcat on 1999 in Japan only, and it is the sequel of the first game.
